articles.title: Australia's unemployment rate falls below 5 per cent for the first time in 10 years - ABC News
articles.description: Australia's unemployment rate falls to 4.9 per cent, with almost 30,000 jobs created in June, according to official ABS data.
articles.content:
With the unemployment rate hitting its lowest level in a decade, you would expect the federal government to be celebrating loudly.
